<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eclectic Sword Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=2441) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Eclectic Sword Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=1319)

</column>

---

You instinctively learn how to use a sword with just a few practice swings. You change one of the swords designated in your [Tengu Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1314) to a new one that you're wielding, provided the sword meets the specifications of Tengu Weapon Familiarity. You can Interact to draw a sword as part of this activity, designating the sword as part of drawing it; disrupting that Interact action prevents you from designating it as one of your swords. This designation lasts until your next daily preparations.
name: Eclectic Sword Mastery
